title: Rothschild (Baron Charles)
body: Wealthy English banker and distinguished entomologist, residing in London. He intends to study some insects from our archipelago and has already identified a species of flea found on the cagarra by the Madeiran scientific expedition that visited the Selvagens in 1922, naming it *Xenopsylla gratiosa*.

Baron Charles Rothschild: Wealthy English banker and distinguished entomologist.

1922: Madeiran scientific expedition to the Selvagens.
